# Configurations

Just for internal use

Configurations through database for Laravel

~~~
"droitformation/registry": "0.1"
~~~

```php
'providers' => array(
    'Droitformation\Registry\RegistryServiceProvider',
)
```

```php
'aliases' => array(
    'Registry' => Droitformation\Registry\Facades\Registry::class,
)
```
